name: Underground - Battle Royale
description:
You wake up as a lucid zombie on a battlefield, the war is not over, if you want to survive you will have to fight to be the last one !

- Their lack of memory makes them unpredictable beware!
- Breakable, weapons and armor have a low durability.

A surprise waiting for winners !

Game realized during the ludum dare 41 by:
Anthony Poncin (programming)
Nicolas Poncin (graphics and animations)

[LD LINK] https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/underground-battle-royal
